title: Designing Customized Mobile Learning Environments for Iranian University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Language education curriculum reflecting characteristics of learners from Iranian cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Apply three types of problem-based learning scenarios to mobile environments to solve real-world language problems
Learners can autonomously infer language rules using discovery learning techniques, leading the process by at least 80%
Enhance learning engagement by over 30% using interactive tools (real-time feedback, group discussion features, etc.) on mobile learning platforms

resources: Question Bank and Discovery Learning Templates

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
